ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to update/delete/select records for composite primary keys from swagger
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In swagger the primary key field is set to integer by default because it considers the default primary key to be 'id'. But if we add a new primary key [composite along with default 'id' key], then while updating/deleting/selecting we need to provide value for primary-key in the format <id-field-value>___<secondary-primary-key-value>. So this primary key is a string. Can this primary-key type be changed to string instead? Also if there is a way to remove dependency from default 'id' field, it would be great help?
